articles.title: A common assumption about aging may be wrong, study suggests - The Seattle Times
articles.summary: A common assumption about aging may be wrong, study suggests Tsimane men work on making spears used to hunt game in the community of San Bernardo in the Bolivian Amazon. A new analysis of data gathered from a small Indigenous population in the Bolivian Amazon suggests some of our basic assumptions about the biological process of aging might be wrong.
